extendedInfo.description: Parched? Looking for something more than a glass of water to quench your thirst? Then look no more! Make yourself a chilled, fizzy, fruity soda in Cola Maker!Experience the process of making a real cola soda. With our special âMakerâ machines straight from the Nutty Factory, youâll be making cola can in less than a minute! Crazy, right? Start by adding water to our proprietary cola soda can. Forget those old bubble machines which added fizz so weak that you had to shake your drink to work up the fizz in your cola soda. Fuzz it up with our special cola soda fizz machine which adds fizz so strong that your drink keeps on bubbling like a raging volcano for hours.  All left to do now is choose a flavor for your drink from the fruit bottles in our vending machine and watch as it magically serves chilled, fruity cola soda. Donât just drink the cola, cook up something delicious to eat with it, and donât worry about the drink, âcause fizz from our machine never dies out!Thatâs not all you can do in Cola Maker, though. Customize your drink â choose the glass to pour it in, decorate it with add-ons, select an environment to drink the cola soda in and serve some appetizing meals; ranging from chocolates to pizzas, along with it. Share your creations with friends over Facebook, or save them to your phone. Cola Maker is endless, fizzy fun!âºâºâºâºâºFEATURESâââââ----------------------âºMultiple fruit flavors to make cola soda with.âºSeveral decorations to choose from to make your cola soda more visually appealing.âºTons of possibilities, allowing you to create thousands of unique cola soda and meal combos.âºScores of unlockable store items for even more fizzy fun. âºIntuitive, easy to use interface.  âºDrink your cola sodas and eat up the side orders.âºShare via Facebook.âºSave screenshots of your created cola sodas and side order combos to your phone.============================================================PRIVACY POLICY:As a designer of kidsâ games, we understand how important privacy is in this modern, digital world. You can read our privacy policy here: www.nuttyapps.com/privacypolicy.IN-APP PURCHASES:Â This app lets you purchase digital content using actual money. On Google Wallet, you can configure parental controls to avoid unintentional purchases.NEED HELP?Contact us with any questions or comments: nuttyfeedback@gmail.comNOTE:App supports Android 2.2(Froyo) to Android 4.x Ice Cream Sandwich and Jellybean.DISCLAIMER:All BGMs are the property of Kevin MacLeod.
